title: 1.8新怪物的名稱?
author: tony1233465
txt_content:
本帖最后由 tony1233465 于 2011-8-3 16:59 编辑 

"Endermen" "Farlanders"
一張新怪物的圖片 通常被稱為"Enderman" 上圖是一張較近距離的照片 我們可以看到主角穿著一個南瓜,大約是用來防止怪物認出他 , 雖然不清楚真實性
此外Notch提到新怪物的名稱"Farlanders" ,這裡有一個關於這個新怪物的投票 按此投票~


A new image of the new creature - commonly referred to as "Endermen" - was released recently. This image is much more up-close-and-personal than the first, giving us a good look at the new creatures. It would seem that wearing a pumpkin prevents the new mob from seeing you, although this is unconfirmed at present.

Additionally, Notch mentioned a possible name-change for the newly minted mob, "Farlander" being suggested and, apparently, already in heavy use.

We have a poll for the creature's name, check it out!
http://www.minecraftforum.net/news/165-18-updates-endermen-or-farlanders/
